text: Lucia Godoy Alcayaga, known by pen name Gabriela MistralNamed after Gabriele d'Annunzio and Frédéric Mistral (7 April 1889 – 10 January 1957) was a Chilean educator, poet, diplomat, and feminist. In 1945, she received the Nobel Prize in Literature. Her best known works include Tala, Desolación, and Lagar. == Note == == Other websites == *http://home.wlu.edu/~barnettj/Holding/99/cstovall/newmistral.htm Category:1889 births Category:1957 deaths Category:Chilean poets Category:Chilean diplomats Category:Feminists
title: Gabriela Mistral
